string.value: This is your third assignment as an informant and you're at #b#m102000000##k with #p1103004#, investigating the causes of the #o1140130#s' erratic behavior. You should talk to #b#p1103004##k.

#p1103004# tells you that the #o1140130#s' erratic behavior was caused by a puppet, but the puppet is not necessarily on the #o1140130#s' bodies, but somewhere outside. You should search the #bPile of Relics#k in #b#m101030101##k and find the #b#t4032319##k.\r\n\r\n#i4032319# #t4032319# #b#c4032319# / 5#k
You retrieved all of the #t4032319#s. #p1103004# seemed genuinely shocked that the puppets were used for such a purpose and told you she'd have to write a report on this. A report? What report?

I am quite certain the puppet plays a part in the #o1140130#s' strange behavior. This detector shows the force of darkness emanating from the puppet and displays it on the screen. If the puppet was inside the #o1140130#s, then it would have been moving, but look, it's not moving at all.

That means the puppet is somewhere around the #o1140130#s, but not necessarily being carried by them. Nearby the excavation site, you'll see a #pile of relics#k lying around. Maybe the kid hid the puppet in there.

In order to stop the #o1140130#s from continuting to be violent, we'll have to defeat them all and retrieve the puppet. Your task right now is to head over to the #b#m101030101##k, blast all the piles of relics, and find the #t4032319#s. The monitor shows that there are #b5#k puppets out there. Please retrieve them all.
You do know how to break apart a pile of relics, right? Just use a #bregular attack#k on it, and the pile will crumble.
Eh...? You don't want to do it? I already gave #p1002104# a reward for helping me out and allâ€¦
Wow, you managed to find all the #t4032319#s in the area. Okay this is going straight into the report.
First, we have to wrap up this project, and that'll take a bit of time, so I want you to stop by later, when you turn Lv. 25.
You have yet to find #b5 #t4032319#s#k? Find a #bpile of relics#k at #m101030101# and break it apart using #bregular attack#k to find the #t4032319#s.
